Detailed Description

Author
David Saxon

Macro Definition Documentation

#define OSS_REGISTER_SUBSYSTEM (   subsystem)

Macro that should be used exactly once in a subsystem DSO in order to provided the needed symbols for Omicron to register the subsystem.

This macro should be used in the global namespace.

Parameters
subsystemThe class name of the subsystem object the library is registering.
